Sentencas: Traditional gas-fired power plants are characterized by low efficiency and challenges in peak regulation.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel multi-generation system integrating solid oxide electrolysis cell and compressed air energy storage with SOFC-GT

Sentencas: Even with the incorporation of compressed air energy storage, they still exhibit deficiencies in flexibility during peak load regulation.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel multi-generation system integrating solid oxide electrolysis cell and compressed air energy storage with SOFC-GT

Sentencas: In this paper, we propose a novel hybrid power system based on gas-fired power plants, capable of producing electricity, heat, and hydrogen, while achieving flexible peak load regulation.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel multi-generation system integrating solid oxide electrolysis cell and compressed air energy storage with SOFC-GT

Sentencas: The system is comprehensively evaluated using energy analysis, exergy analysis, and economic analysis.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel multi-generation system integrating solid oxide electrolysis cell and compressed air energy storage with SOFC-GT

Sentencas: Results show that the total energy efficiency and exergy efficiency of this hybrid power system perform well, surpassing existing research on fuel cell-gas turbine systems.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel multi-generation system integrating solid oxide electrolysis cell and compressed air energy storage with SOFC-GT

Sentencas: Among the subsystems, the fuel cell contributes the most to the total energy output of the hybrid system but also incurs the highest exergy losses, while the relative exergy losses of the water electrolysis and compressed air energy storage systems are relatively small.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel multi-generation system integrating solid oxide electrolysis cell and compressed air energy storage with SOFC-GT

Sentencas: The configuration of dual energy storage systems enhances the flexibility in peak load regulation.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel multi-generation system integrating solid oxide electrolysis cell and compressed air energy storage with SOFC-GT

Sentencas: Additionally, the proposed hybrid system exhibits low carbon emissions of 0.08 to 0.12 t/GJ.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel multi-generation system integrating solid oxide electrolysis cell and compressed air energy storage with SOFC-GT

Sentencas: Considering factors such as discount rate, the initial investment cost can be recovered in 5.81 years, and the calculated net present value is 492,275.82 k$. Thus, the proposed scheme also possesses certain advantages in terms of economic feasibility.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel multi-generation system integrating solid oxide electrolysis cell and compressed air energy storage with SOFC-GT
